quote.copy: "I’ve said if Ivanka weren’t my daughter, perhaps I’d be dating her."
"The concept of global warming was created by and for the Chinese in order to make U.S. manufacturing non-competitive."
"If I decide to run for office, I'll produce my tax returns. Absolutely."
"Arianna Huffington is unattractive, both inside and out. I fully understand why her former husband left her for a man - he made a good decision."
"I have a great relationship with the blacks. I've always had a great relationship with the blacks."
"I'm intelligent. Some people would say I'm very, very, very intelligent."
"RT @mplefty67: If Hillary Clinton can't satisfy her husband what makes her think she can satisfy America?"
"Frederick Douglass is an example of somebody who’s done an amazing job and is getting recognized more and more, I notice."
"I will build a great wall - and nobody builds walls better than me, believe me - and I'll build them very inexpensively."
"I will make Mexico pay for that wall. Mark my words."
"I'm, like, a smart person."
"[Being President] is more work than in my previous life. I thought it would be easier."
"I think $10 billion or less [for the wall]. And if I do a super-duper, higher, better, better security, everything else, maybe it goes a little bit more."
"My fingers are long and beautiful, as, it has been well documented, are various other parts of my body."
"You know what uranium is? This thing called nuclear weapons and other things, like lots of things are done with uranium, including some bad things."
"I have a very good brain and I have said a lot of things."
"I don't stand by anything."
"We can’t have someone in the Oval Office who doesn’t understand the meaning of the word ‘confidential.’"
"But in a short period of time I understood everything there was to know about health care.""
"There’s nobody bigger or better at the military than I am."
"Nobody has more respect for women than I do."
"There’s nobody that understands the horror of nuclear better than me."
"It is a great honor to be here with all of my friends - so amazing and will never forget."
"You know, if you’re a conservative Republican, if I were a liberal, if, like, OK, if I ran as a liberal Democrat, they would say I'm one of the smartest people anywhere in the world."
"My uncle used to tell me about nuclear before nuclear was nuclear."
"An 'extremely credible source' has called my office and told me that Barack Obama's birth certificate is a fraud."
"Remember, don't believe "sources said" by the VERY dishonest media. If they don't name the sources, the sources don't exist."
"Nobody knew healthcare could be so complicated."
"[John McCain's] not a war hero. I like people who weren’t captured."
"I know words, I have the best words."
"I don't repeat myself. I don't repeat myself."
"I will tell you this, Russia: If you’re listening, I hope you’re able to find the 30,000 emails that are missing."
"Knock the crap out of him. I promise you I'll pay for the legal fees."
"I have the most loyal people. I could stand in the middle of 5th Avenue and shoot somebody and wouldn't lose any voters."
"@BarackObama has a record low 39% Gallup approval rating. Why so high?"
"They show those phony statistics where we are 5.4% unemployment. The real number, I saw a number that could be 42%, believe it or not."
"President Obama played golf yesterday???"
"Ted Nugent was obviously using a figure of speech [when threatening Barack Obama], unfortunate as it was."
"Crooked Hillary Clinton and her team "were extremely careless in their handling of very sensitive, highly classified information." Not fit!"
"We're going to dedicate this trophy to all of those [hurricane victims] that went through so much that we love."
"I hate to tell you Puerto Rico, but you've thrown our budget a little out of whack."
quote.source: Puerto Rico relief visit, post-Hurricane Maria

quote.copy: "You like the F-35? ... You can't see it. You literally can't see it. It's hard to fight a plane you can't see."
quote.source: Puerto Rico relief visit, post-Hurricane Maria

quote.copy: "I am not trying to get "top level security clearance" for my children. This was a typically false news story."
"He [Obama] lost the popular vote by a lot and won the election. We should have a revolution in this country!"
"We need a President who isn't a laughing stock to the entire World. We need a truly great leader, a genius at strategy and winning. Respect!"

quote: "Obama looks absolutely exhausted in the Netherlands. He is not a natural leader, was never ment to lead - it is tough work for him"

quote.copy: "I am honered to serve you, the great American People."
"I am being investigated for firing the FBI Director by the man who told me to fire the FBI Director! Witch Hunt."
"Are you allowed to impeach a president for gross incompetence?"
"Wikileaks! I love Wikileaks."
"I would like to wish all fathers, even the haters and losers, a very happy Fathers Day."
"I would like to extend my best wishes to all, even the haters and losers, on this special date, September 11th."
"Do you think Putin will be going to The Miss Universe Pageant in November in Moscow - if so, will he become my new best friend?"
"The Panama Canal is doing quite well...and also, friendship with the president is very, very good."
"That’s it, bye-bye. Wave goodbye. What a mess."
"If I had been the son of a coal miner, I would have left the damn mines. But most people don’t have the imagination — or whatever — to leave their mine. They don’t have “it.”."
"Your reputation is amazing. I will not let you [Alex Jones] down."
"We're thinking about building the wall as a solar wall...Pretty good imagination, right? Good? My idea."
"I love all people - rich or poor - but in those particular positions, I just don't want a poor person."
"I have a son. He's 10 years old. He has computers. He is so good with these computers, it's unbelievable. The security aspect of cyber is very, very tough."
"James Comey better hope that there are no "tapes" of our conversations before he starts leaking to the press!"
"I did not make, and do not have, any such recordings [of James Comey]."
"I just start kissing them. It’s like a magnet. Just kiss. I don’t even wait. And when you’re a star, they let you do it. You can do anything."
"I was the first & only potential GOP candidate to state there will be no cuts to Social Security, Medicare & Medicaid. Huckabee copied me."
"The leaks are absolutely real. The news is fake because so much of the news is fake."
"Grab ’em by the pussy. You can do anything."
"This is infinity here. It could be infinity. We don’t really don’t know. But it could be. It has to be something — but it could be infinity, right?"
"I am going to give a major speech on, probably Monday of next week. And we're going to be discussing all of things that have taken place with the Clintons."
"Obama's complaints about Republicans stopping his agenda are BS since he had full control for two years. He can never take responsibility."
"Be prepared, there is a small chance that our horrendous leadership could unknowingly lead us into World War III."

"When Mexico sends its people, they're not sending their best. They're sending people that have lots of problems, and they're bringing those problems with us. They're bringing drugs. They're bringing crime. They're rapists. And some, I assume, are good people."
"What a crowd! What a turnout!"
"Windmills are the greatest threat in the US to both, bald and golden eagles. Media claims fictional ‘global warming’ is worse."
"I do respect [Putin]...You think our country's so innocent?"
"I have plenty of time on my hands."
"[Puerto Rico] is an island, sitting in the middle of an ocean. It's a big ocean. It's a very big ocean."
"I guarantee you I have a vocabulary better than all of them, certainly most of them."
"If Putin likes me and he thinks I'm a good, smart person, I hope he believes it."
"I'm not a big e-mail person. You know why? I'm intelligent. I know about e-mail."
"I think I have the best temperament, or one of the best temperaments, of anyone who has ever run for president."
"Don’t ask [Vice President Mike Pence] — he wants to hang [all gay people]!"
"Why is @BarackObama constantly issuing executive orders that are major power grabs of authority?"
"They sacrifice every day for the furniture -- and future of their children."
"If you run for president, you shouldn't be allowed to use teleprompters. Because you don't even know if the guy is smart."
"Another historic step toward future development and future — with a — a future — with a future. A real future. I have to say, that's a real future."
"If I knew they had these teleprompters, I would have used them. I'm starting to love these teleprompters"
"George Papadopoulos, he’s an oil and energy consultant, excellent guy."
quote.source: Meeting with Washington Post Editorial Board

quote.copy: "Few people knew the young, low level volunteer named George [Papadopoulos], who has already proven to be a liar."
"I don't remember saying that [I have one of the best memories in the world]. As good as my memory is, I don't remember that, but I have a good memory."
